item.title: 'My friend died right in front of me' - Student describes moment air force jet crashed into school
item.description: Farhan Hasan had just sat an exam when a Bangladeshi air force jet crashed into his school, killing at least 20 people.

item.title: Migrants deported from US tortured in El Salvador, Venezuela says
item.description: Venezuela is investigating claims of human rights abuses against 250 people detained in notorious prison.

item.title: The voices in the cockpit fuelling controversy over Air India crash
item.description: Air India 171's crash report offered no closure - just more speculation and one haunting, unexplained detail.

item.title: Taylor Swift and Drake music giant files to list on US stock market
item.description: It comes as two major US share indexes closed at new record highs on Monday.

item.title: Accuser says 'rollercoaster' of Epstein files saga is a 'real weight' on victims
item.description: Annie Farmer believes the case has been politicised and says the recent wave of publicity has left her feeling "used" and exhausted.
